<!-- Add CSS for the animation effects -->
<style>
/* Animation for profile picture */
.profile-picture {
  transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out;
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  opacity: 0;
  animation: fadeIn 1s forwards ease-in-out;
}

.profile-picture:hover {
  transform: scale(1.05);
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
  0% { opacity: 0; }
  100% { opacity: 1; }
}

/* Animation for Hello, I'm Jiye Choi */
.fade-in-text {
  opacity: 0;
  animation: fadeInText 3s forwards;
}

@keyframes fadeInText {
  0% { opacity: 0; }
  100% { opacity: 1; }
}

/* Fade-in animation for sections */
.fade-in-section {
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 1s ease-in-out;
}

/* Animation trigger based on scroll */
.is-visible {
  opacity: 1;
}

/* Hover effect for entire list item: move to the right and add underline */
ul li {
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

ul li:hover {
    transform: translateX(5px);
    text-decoration: underline;
}

@media (hover: none) {
  ul li:active {
    transform: translateX(5px);
    text-decoration: underline;
}
</style>

<!-- Add JavaScript for scroll-triggered fade-in animations -->
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
  const fadeElements = document.querySelectorAll('.fade-in-section');
  
  function handleScroll() {
    fadeElements.forEach(el => {
      const rect = el.getBoundingClientRect();
      if (rect.top < window.innerHeight && rect.bottom >= 0) {
        el.classList.add('is-visible');
      }
    });
  }

  window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
});
</script>
